scripts.deploy: (yarn run buidler deploy --export '../dapp/network.json') && yarn run copy-interface-artifacts
scripts.deploy:ganache: (yarn run buidler deploy --network ganache --export '../dapp/network.json') && yarn run copy-interface-artifacts
scripts.deploy:mainnet: (yarn run buidler deploy --network mainnet --export '../dapp/network.json') && yarn run copy-interface-artifacts
scripts.node:ganache: yarn run ganache-cli -h localhost -p 7546 -m 'replace hover unaware super where filter stone fine garlic address matrix basic'
scripts.node:fork: yarn run ganache-cli -f https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/988930c507b9488a82849f5d16c0ca13 -h localhost -p 7546 -m 'replace hover unaware super where filter stone fine garlic address matrix basic' -u 0x3f5CE5FBFe3E9af3971dD833D26bA9b5C936f0bE
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:js && yarn run lint:sol
scripts.prettier: yarn run prettier:js && yarn run prettier:sol
scripts.test:fork: FORK=true yarn run buidler test --network ganache
scripts.fund: yarn run buidler --network ganache run scripts/fund.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf deployments && rm -rf cache
